api_name: Mux API: Retrieve space broadcast
functionality: Retrieves the details of a broadcast of a specific space.

api_name: Mux API: Delete a space broadcast
functionality: Deletes a single broadcast of a specific space. Broadcasts can only be deleted when `idle`.

api_name: Mux API: Start a space broadcast
functionality: Starts broadcasting a space to the associated destination. Broadcasts can only be started when the space is `active` (when there

api_name: Mux API: Stop a space broadcast
functionality: Stops broadcasting a space, causing the destination live stream to become idle. This API also automatically calls `complete` on the

api_name: Mux API: Create a space broadcast
functionality: Creates a new broadcast. Broadcasts are used to create composited versions of your space, which can be broadcast to live

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a space
functionality: Retrieves the details of a space that has previously been created. Supply the unique space ID that was returned from

api_name: Mux API: Delete a space
functionality: Deletes a space. Spaces can only be deleted when `idle`.

api_name: Mux API: Create a space
functionality: Create a new space. Spaces are used to build [real-time video applications.](https://mux.com/real-time-video)

api_name: Mux API: List spaces
functionality: List all spaces in the current environment.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a Transcription Vocabulary
functionality: Retrieves the details of a Transcription Vocabulary that has previously been created. Supply the unique Transcription Vocabulary ID and Mux

api_name: Mux API: Delete a Transcription Vocabulary
functionality: Deletes a Transcription Vocabulary. The Transcription Vocabulary's ID will be disassociated from any live streams using it. Transcription Vocabularies can

api_name: Mux API: Update a Transcription Vocabulary
functionality: Updates the details of a previously-created Transcription Vocabulary. Updates to Transcription Vocabularies are allowed while associated live streams are active.

api_name: Mux API: Create a Transcription Vocabulary
functionality: Create a new Transcription Vocabulary.

api_name: Mux API: List Transcription Vocabularies
functionality: List all Transcription Vocabularies.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a Web Input
functionality: Retrieve a single Web Input's info

api_name: Mux API: Delete a Web Input
functionality: Deletes a Web Input and all its data

api_name: Mux API: Launch a Web Input
functionality: Launches the browsers instance, loads the URL specified, and then starts streaming to the specified Live Stream.

api_name: Mux API: Shut down a Web Input
functionality: Ends streaming to the specified Live Stream, and then shuts down the Web Input browser instance.

api_name: Mux API: Reload a Web Input
functionality:
Reloads the page that a Web Input is displaying.

Note: Using this when the Web Input is streaming will display the

api_name: Mux API: Update Web Input URL
functionality:
Changes the URL that a Web Input loads when it launches.

Note: This can only be called when the Web Input

api_name: Mux API: Create a new Web Input
functionality: Create a new Web Input

api_name: Mux API: List Web Inputs
functionality: List Web Inputs

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a playback ID
functionality: Retrieves information about the specified playback ID.

api_name: Mux API: Delete a playback ID
functionality: Deletes a playback ID, rendering it nonfunctional for viewing an asset's video content. Please note that deleting the playback ID

api_name: Mux API: Create a playback ID
functionality: Creates a playback ID that can be used to stream the asset to a viewer.

api_name: Mux API: Delete an asset track
functionality: Removes a text track from an asset. Audio and video tracks on assets cannot be removed.

api_name: Mux API: Generate track subtitles
functionality: Generates subtitles (captions) for a given audio track. This API can be used for up to 7 days after an

api_name: Mux API: Create an asset track
functionality: Adds an asset track (for example, subtitles, or an alternate audio track) to an asset.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve an asset
functionality: Retrieves the details of an asset that has previously been created. Supply the unique asset ID that was returned from

api_name: Mux API: Delete an asset
functionality: Deletes a video asset and all its data.

api_name: Mux API: Update an asset
functionality: Updates the details of an already-created Asset with the provided Asset ID. This currently supports only the `passthrough` field.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve asset input info
functionality: Returns a list of the input objects that were used to create the asset along with any settings that were

api_name: Mux API: Update MP4 support
functionality: Allows you to add or remove mp4 support for assets that were created without it. Currently there are two values

api_name: Mux API: Update master access
functionality: Allows you to add temporary access to the master (highest-quality) version of the asset in MP4 format. A URL will

api_name: Mux API: Create an asset
functionality: Create a new Mux Video asset.

api_name: Mux API: List assets
functionality: List all Mux assets.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a live stream playback ID
functionality: Fetches information about a live stream's playback ID, through which a viewer can watch the streamed content from this live

api_name: Mux API: Delete a live stream playback ID
functionality: Deletes the playback ID for the live stream. This will not disable ingest (as the live stream still exists). New

api_name: Mux API: Create a live stream playback ID
functionality: Create a new playback ID for this live stream, through which a viewer can watch the streamed content of the

api_name: Mux API: Delete a live stream simulcast target
functionality: Delete the simulcast target using the simulcast target ID returned when creating the simulcast target. Simulcast Target can only be

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a live stream simulcast target
functionality: Retrieves the details of the simulcast target created for the parent live stream. Supply the unique live stream ID and

api_name: Mux API: Create a live stream simulcast target
functionality: Create a simulcast target for the parent live stream. Simulcast target can only be created when the parent live stream

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a live stream
functionality: Retrieves the details of a live stream that has previously been created. Supply the unique live stream ID that was

api_name: Mux API: Delete a live stream
functionality: Deletes a live stream from the current environment. If the live stream is currently active and being streamed to, ingest

api_name: Mux API: Update a live stream
functionality: Updates the parameters of a previously-created live stream. This currently supports a subset of variables. Supply the live stream ID

api_name: Mux API: Reset a live stream's stream key
functionality: Reset a live stream key if you want to immediately stop the current stream key from working and create a

api_name: Mux API: Signal a live stream is finished
functionality: (Optional) End the live stream recording immediately instead of waiting for the reconnect_window. `EXT-X-ENDLIST` tag is added to the HLS

api_name: Mux API: Disable a live stream
functionality: Disables a live stream, making it reject incoming RTMP streams until re-enabled. The API also ends the live stream recording

api_name: Mux API: Enable a live stream
functionality: Enables a live stream, allowing it to accept an incoming RTMP stream.

api_name: Mux API: Update a live stream's embedded subtitles
functionality:
Configures a live stream to receive embedded closed captions.
The resulting Asset's subtitle text track will have `closed_captions: true` set.

api_name: Mux API: Update a live stream's generated subtitles
functionality:
Updates a live stream's automatic-speech-recognition-generated subtitle configuration.
Automatic speech recognition subtitles can be removed by sending an empty array in the
request

api_name: Mux API: Create a live stream
functionality: Creates a new live stream. Once created, an encoder can connect to Mux via the specified stream key and begin

api_name: Mux API: List live streams
functionality: Lists the live streams that currently exist in the current environment.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a URL signing key
functionality: This route is now deprecated, please use the `Signing Keys` API. Retrieves the details of a URL signing key that

api_name: Mux API: Delete a URL signing key
functionality: This route is now deprecated, please use the `Signing Keys` API. Deletes an existing signing key. Use with caution, as

api_name: Mux API: Create a URL signing key
functionality: This route is now deprecated, please use the `Signing Keys` API. Creates a new signing key pair. When creating a

api_name: Mux API: List URL signing keys
functionality:
This route is now deprecated, please use the `Signing Keys` API. Returns a list of URL signing keys.

Note: Any new

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a single direct upload's info
functionality: Fetches information about a single direct upload in the current environment.

api_name: Mux API: Cancel a direct upload
functionality:
Cancels a direct upload and marks it as cancelled. If a pending upload finishes after this
request, no asset will be

api_name: Mux API: Create a new direct upload URL
functionality: Creates a new direct upload, through which video content can be uploaded for ingest to Mux.

api_name: Mux API: List direct uploads
functionality: Lists direct uploads in the current environment.

api_name: Mux API: Delete a Playback Restriction
functionality: Deletes a single Playback Restriction.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a Playback Restriction
functionality: Retrieves a Playback Restriction associated with the unique identifier.

api_name: Mux API: Update the Referrer Playback Restriction
functionality: Allows you to modify the list of domains or change how Mux validates playback requests without the `Referer` HTTP header.

api_name: Mux API: Create a Playback Restriction
functionality: Create a new Playback Restriction.

api_name: Mux API: List Playback Restrictions
functionality: Returns a list of all Playback Restrictions.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve an asset or live stream ID
functionality: Retrieves the Identifier of the Asset or Live Stream associated with the Playback ID.

api_name: Mux API: List Usage
functionality: Returns a list of delivery usage records and their associated Asset IDs or Live Stream IDs.

api_name: Mux API: List Video Views
functionality: Returns a list of video views which match the filters and have a `view_end` within the specified timeframe.

api_name: Mux API: Get a Video View
functionality: Returns the details of a video view.

api_name: Mux API: List Filters
functionality:
The API has been replaced by the list-dimensions API call.

Lists all the filters broken out into basic and advanced.

api_name: Mux API: Lists values for a specific filter
functionality:
The API has been replaced by the list-dimension-values API call.

Lists the values for a filter along with a total count

api_name: Mux API: List Dimensions
functionality:
List all available dimensions.

Note: This API replaces the list-filters API call.

api_name: Mux API: Lists the values for a specific dimension
functionality:
Lists the values for a dimension along with a total count of related views.

Note: This API replaces the list-filter-values API

api_name: Mux API: List property video view export links
functionality:
The API has been replaced by the list-exports-views API call.

Lists the available video view exports along with URLs to retrieve

api_name: Mux API: List available property view exports
functionality: Lists the available video view exports along with URLs to retrieve them.

api_name: Mux API: List breakdown values
functionality: List the breakdown values for a specific metric.

api_name: Mux API: Get Overall values
functionality: Returns the overall value for a specific metric, as well as the total view count, watch time, and the Mux

api_name: Mux API: List Insights
functionality: Returns a list of insights for a metric. These are the worst performing values across all breakdowns sorted by how

api_name: Mux API: Get metric timeseries data
functionality:
Returns timeseries data for a specific metric.

Each interval represented in the data array contains an array with the following values:

api_name: Mux API: List all metric values
functionality: List all of the values across every breakdown for a specific metric.

api_name: Mux API: Get Monitoring Breakdown
functionality: Gets breakdown information for a specific dimension and metric along with the number of concurrent viewers and negative impact score.

api_name: Mux API: Get Monitoring Breakdown Timeseries
functionality: Gets timeseries of breakdown information for a specific dimension and metric. Each datapoint in the response represents 5 seconds worth

api_name: Mux API: Get Monitoring Timeseries
functionality: Gets Time series information for a specific metric along with the number of concurrent viewers.

api_name: Mux API: List Monitoring Metrics
functionality: Lists available monitoring metrics.

api_name: Mux API: Get Monitoring Histogram Timeseries
functionality: Gets histogram timeseries information for a specific metric.

api_name: Mux API: List Monitoring Dimensions
functionality: Lists available monitoring dimensions.

api_name: Mux API: Get Real-Time Breakdown
functionality: Gets breakdown information for a specific dimension and metric along with the number of concurrent viewers and negative impact score.

api_name: Mux API: Get Real-Time Timeseries
functionality: Gets Time series information for a specific metric along with the number of concurrent viewers. This API is now deprecated,

api_name: Mux API: List Real-Time Metrics
functionality: Lists available real-time metrics. This API is now deprecated, please use the `List Monitoring Metrics` API.

api_name: Mux API: Get Real-Time Histogram Timeseries
functionality: Gets histogram timeseries information for a specific metric. This API is now deprecated, please use the `Get Monitoring Histogram Timeseries`

api_name: Mux API: List Real-Time Dimensions
functionality: Lists available real-time dimensions. This API is now deprecated, please use the `List Monitoring Dimensions` API.

api_name: Mux API: Get an Incident
functionality: Returns the details of an incident.

api_name: Mux API: List Related Incidents
functionality: Returns all the incidents that seem related to a specific incident.

api_name: Mux API: List Incidents
functionality: Returns a list of incidents.

api_name: Mux API: List Errors
functionality: Returns a list of errors.

api_name: Mux API: Retrieve a signing key
functionality:
Retrieves the details of a signing key that has previously
been created. Supply the unique signing key ID that was returned

api_name: Mux API: Delete a signing key
functionality: Deletes an existing signing key. Use with caution, as this will invalidate any existing signatures and no JWTs can be

api_name: Mux API: Create a signing key
functionality: Creates a new signing key pair. When creating a new signing key, the API will generate a 2048-bit RSA key-pair

api_name: Mux API: List signing keys
functionality: Returns a list of signing keys.
